phrs.translation: 普莱辛, 总裁普莱兴, 斯, 普莱兴

sentences.sentence: My acquaintances were prising out the gold teeth of not-yet dead knights.
sentences.translation: 我的熟人们正从那些还没死透的骑士嘴里向外拔金牙。

sentences.sentence: The police had the greatest difficulty in prising the truth out of the prisoner.
sentences.translation: 我们最感困难的是要这个窃贼吐露真情。

sentences.sentence: A town-dweller was visiting the country and was prising the cleanliness of the air.
sentences.translation: 一个城里人到乡下去游玩，他特别赞赏那里洁净的空气。
